entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Scoped ServiceProvider not releasing disposing HttpClient #96296
  • [API Proposal]: BFloat16 #96295
  • Wasmtime Async Compatibility #96293

Closed

  • An error occurred when linking a static library ".lib" compiled using NativeAOT with a C++ project. #96298
  • Regression: DateTimeOffset.ParseExact FormatException message reports an empty string instead of the actual string. #96232
  • string.IndexOf(string) poor performance in other cultures #96221
    Future
  • String comparison regression bug #96205
  • [Mono][RISC-V] Undefined Behavior caused by return ulong as uint8 without cast #96276

PullRequests

Created

  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 120.0.6099.129, windows: 120.0.6099.129 #96292
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono

Merged

  • Fix missing return in Microsoft.Bcl.TimeProvider's Task.WaitAsync #96240
    community-contribution, area-System.DateTime

Updated

  • Override DbConnection.DbProviderFactory for ODBC/OleDB #96290
    area-System.Data.Odbc
  • Ensure that ICU is loaded in tests before checking its version #96288
    area-System.Globalization
  • Implement Interlocked for small types. #92974
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Allow specifying IndentText when writing JSON #95292
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Enable more MT PLinq areas #96215
    arch-wasm, area-System.Linq.Parallel
  • [mono][aot] Allow valuetype sharing in wrappers for valuetypes with an explicit l… #96230
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [NativeAOT] Faster lookup for method infos on Windows. #96283
    os-windows, tenet-performance, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Wraping both declaration and definition in #ifndef DISABLE_LOGGING. #91042
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Add runtime module address to SpecialDiagInfo block in createdump and fix missing DotNetRuntimeDebugHeader export #96121
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging] Change Native AOT ThreadBuffer.m_threadId to OS thread id #96120
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.x
